attributes.action: Scrap any planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. Public OR Private funded.... 1.7 million+ do NOT want road pricing. Listen for once ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1.7 Million signed a petition to scrap planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy. Listen to them instead or ploughing on despite the petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
